mapper.select: select t1.*, (t1.after_count-t1.before_count) subCount, t2.machine_code, t7.name goodsName, CONCAT( t4.province, t4.city, t4.district, if(t4.circle='其他','',t4.circle),IFNULL(t3.mall,""),IFNULL( t3.name,'') ) AS localeStr from inno72_supply_channel_history t1 left join inno72_machine t2 on t1.machine_id=t2.id LEFT JOIN inno72_locale t3 ON t3.id = t2.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area t4 ON t4.CODE = t3.area_code left join inno72_supply_channel_goods t6 on t1.supply_channel_id=t6.supply_channel_id left join inno72_goods t7 on t6.goods_id=t7.id where t1.batch_no=#{batchNo} and t1.after_count>0
